description: This file defines a React component for a modal dialog that allows users to add a transaction, including product selection, miscellaneous items, and form submission handling. It uses react-hook-form for form state management, zod for validation, and integrates with external services for fetching products and saving transactions.

methods.name: AddTransactionModal
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering a modal dialog for creating a new transaction, managing form state, fetching products, handling form submission, and rendering UI elements.
